name: immich-public-proxy
description: Immich Public Proxy exposes public sharing features of Immich through a small proxy service. It helps safely publish shared albums or links while keeping the main Immich instance protected behind authentication.
features: Public Sharing: Safely expose shared Immich albums to the internet.
Proxy Layer: Add security layer between public access and your Immich server.
Protected Instance: Keep main Immich installation behind authentication.
Selective Exposure: Choose which albums or links to make publicly accessible.
Security Enhancement: Prevent direct access to your private Immich instance.
Share Links: Enable public sharing links without compromising server security.
Access Control: Manage what content is publicly visible versus private.
Immich Integration: Seamlessly works with Immich's sharing features.
